languages.text: The ally who kills this enemy, restores 1 AP and gets +1 to Resolve.

traits.locale_text: The ally who kills this enemy, restores 1 AP and gets +1 to Resolve.

languages.text: Upon killing this target, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} or their ally regains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and gains a stacking +1 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Upon killing this target, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} or their ally regains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and gains a stacking +1 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

Upon killing this target, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} or their ally regains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and gains a stacking +1 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

Upon killing this target, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} or their ally regains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and gains a stacking +1 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

languages.text: Al matar a su objetivo, el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} o su aliado recupera +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y recibe una bonificación acumulativa de +1 a la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g}.
languages.original_text: Upon killing this target, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} or their ally regains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and gains a stacking +1 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Al matar a su objetivo, el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} o su aliado recupera +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y recibe una bonificación acumulativa de +1 a la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}或其盟友击杀此单位时，恢复1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，同时获得+1{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}。
languages.original_text: Upon killing this target, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} or their ally regains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and gains a stacking +1 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}或其盟友击杀此单位时，恢复1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，同时获得+1{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}。

languages.text: En éliminant cette cible, le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} ou son allié récupère +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et bénéficie d'un bonus cumulatif de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Détermination{/g} de +1.
languages.original_text: Upon killing this target, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} or their ally regains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and gains a stacking +1 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

traits.locale_text: En éliminant cette cible, le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} ou son allié récupère +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et bénéficie d'un bonus cumulatif de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Détermination{/g} de +1.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g} veya dost birimi, bu hedefi öldürdüğünde +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} geri kazanır ve {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılık{/g} niteliğine +1 bonus (üst üste birikebilir) elde eder.
languages.original_text: Upon killing this target, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} or their ally regains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and gains a stacking +1 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g} veya dost birimi, bu hedefi öldürdüğünde +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} geri kazanır ve {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılık{/g} niteliğine +1 bonus (üst üste birikebilir) elde eder.

languages.text: Убив врага, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g} или его союзник восстанавливает 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и получает суммирующийся бонус +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g}.
languages.original_text: Upon killing this target, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} or their ally regains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and gains a stacking +1 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Убив врага, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g} или его союзник восстанавливает 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и получает суммирующийся бонус +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g}.

Убив врага, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g} или его союзник восстанавливает 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и получает суммирующийся бонус +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g}.

languages.text: この対象を倒すと、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g} またはその味方は{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を+1回復し、{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}解決{/g} に +1 のボーナスを重ねて得る。
languages.original_text: Upon killing this target, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} or their ally regains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and gains a stacking +1 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この対象を倒すと、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} またはその味方は{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} を +1 回復し、{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}解決{/g} に +1 のボーナスを重ねて得る。

languages.text: Wird dieses Ziel getötet, regeneriert der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} oder sein Verbündeter +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und erhält einen stapelbaren Bonus von +1 auf {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}.
languages.original_text: Upon killing this target, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} or their ally regains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and gains a stacking +1 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wird dieses Ziel getötet, regeneriert der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} oder sein Verbündeter +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und erhält einen stapelbaren Bonus von +1 auf {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}.
